website_summaries.verdict: This cover is great if you're looking for something sturdy and stylish with multiple stand options while not spending a ton of money.
pros: Features three different slots for use as a stand
Includes a holder for a stylus and a card pocket that can be used for business cards and credit cards
Available in a variety of prints and colors
cons: Some buyers said the edges of the case covered a little too much of the screen
Also does add some bulk to the iPad Mini

customer_reviews.title: Superb--except for one thing.
customer_reviews.text: So I went with the white marble design, which looks terrific. And my iPad mini 2 fits into it like a charm. It's light but sturdy. The three ridges to keep the mini upright are nifty. All pertinent buttons are easily accessible. And the sleep feature works beautifully. But now for the bad news: it smells. I aired it out overnight and got rid of the cover odor. Alas, once I opened the case there was that chemical smell again--and airing it out for days on end has hardly diminished it. I guess I'll have to take the bad with the good.
customer_reviews.author: The Not So Little Prince

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cover - Better Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package I immediately loved the case and the fact that it has a stylus loop. I never use my iPad without a stylus. The look of the cover is just as pictured. No one would know it's an iPad. When the seller contacted me via email to ask if I was satisfied with my purchase that made me feel as though my purchase was appreciated. It's hard to find good customer service these days, so for me, that took this purchase from 5 stars to the moon! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect, works well as basic case
customer_reviews.text: The fit was perfect for my iPad Mini 3, and I like the looks and function. The stand function does work, and it seems to be very well-constructed. It does not snap closed, no pockets, no bells or whistles. After 2 months I haven't had it long enough to vouch for durability, but I gave it 5 stars anyway. This was a good value, even if it doesn't last forever. Note: my old cover was high quality leather, had pockets and a magnetic snap closure that this one does not, but it never fit perfectly, would not stand up correctly, always a hassle. So far I'm much happier with this one.
customer_reviews.author: LadyExec

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use the Touch ID
customer_reviews.text: The case is as described but it is very hard to use the Touch ID to unlock the iPad because the material is thick and the cutout is too close to the button. The opening should be bigger to allow for easy access, and doing this won't make it less protective. All around I think the case is fine, but it is a bit 'clunky' around the iPad which is otherwise a sleek device. I like the color and the quality of the stitching, and the pen holder and front pocket are good additions to the case. So overall, I'd say it is 'fine'. Not great, not bad, but fine.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: For some reason I have a hard time finding an iPad case with the three little "stoppers" to give you different view angles - I like those angles and so I wanted them
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a much less cute version of this at a big box store (it was just black) that was $30. For some reason I have a hard time finding an iPad case with the three little "stoppers" to give you different view angles - I like those angles and so I wanted them :). I also like that this is sturdy, my iPad feels very well insulated and that it turns off my iPad when I shut the case. I had thought the magnets wouldn't be strong enough to keep the case shut but they do a really good job. I'm really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Very durable material!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these. This is my new white one next to my older blue one. After over a year of daily heavy use the old one is just starting to show some cracking at the corners, and the design is a bit faded. The three different angles for viewing is an especially useful feature. This iPad has been dropped many times while in this case and it still works. I hope these cases are still available in a year when my new one shows wear! I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: derpbag

customer_reviews.title: Well made case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! I got the composition book cover and it is really nice. It looks like a notepad laying on the table, it would be good to make your iPad more discrete for traveling or in a locker (less likely to get stolen.) It makes my iPad seem a lot thicker than the last case I had but I don’t mind that, it seems more protected. It stays propped up well without slipping out like the last case I had.
customer_reviews.author: J Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Not able to stand up in portrait mode!
customer_reviews.text: How many people hold their iPad Minis in landscape mode? Very few, I suspect. So why is it so hard to find a case that rotates so the iPad can be propped up in portrait mode, which is the most common way to hold an iPad? The pictures are misleading. Plus, this case is bulky and takes up too much room on the front of the iPad. I returned this case within an hour after receiving it. At least the delivery was fast, fwiw.
customer_reviews.author: Ransuz

customer_reviews.title: Great value looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Great value looks nice I never take my iPad out of the house so it doesn’t get abused too much but I have dropped it many times and it does protect my iPad and it’s got a strong magnet so it stays closed even if you drop it. It also has a pouch on the front if you want to put money or in it notes The pouch is just a slit opening it does not have a zipper or a lock that is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Connie C. N.Calif

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I like this case better than any one I’ve had so far. It’s going to last a long time because of the excellent quality. The pocket is wonderful and so helpful. It stays closed with a magnet that keeps it from gapping . It fits perfect - nice and snug so that it doesn’t interfere with the screen and get in the way. But what I like most , when you stand it in a position, it STAYS without slipping down!! I love this case!!
customer_reviews.author: LaFran

customer_reviews.title: A VERY sturdy iPad cover
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at how substantive the iPad cover is. My iPad fits very snugly into the frame of the cover and there are three leather strips on the inner side of the cover lid that allows the iPad to rest on if you are working hands free. I also think the price of this cover is very reasonable. I would not hesitate to order from this company!
customer_reviews.author: MHK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality cover
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of a Fintie mini iPad cover. They are very well made, they feel nice. The iPad fits very well in the cover. I like the magnetic closure and it how comes on when you open the cover. My old cover is still in very good condition after several years but I just wanted a different pattern. I like the way it sits up in the cover with three positions. It also has a slot on the front for any paperwork or other slim item. This is the brand I look for in an iPad cover.
customer_reviews.author: msmothra

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and sturdy. Lacks an important feature.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this cover for a few days. It’s attractive and sturdy for the price. It is lacking one feature which I find annoying. My previous iPad jacket had a front cover that folded over so it did not block the camera. This one does not fold in half, so the front cover flaps loosely when taking a picture. It makes it difficult to hold the iPad steady when taking pictures. I was disappointed to discover this. I’ll be sure to look for a jacket with this important feature next time.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe B Beebe

customer_reviews.title: Great design but one flaw.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case for my iPad mini 2 since 4/2018. I share my mini 2 with my son and he has dropped it several times. My only complaint is the design flaw for the home-button area. It is too small for an index or thumb finger flat accesss with compatibility finger print feature. So to enhance my access to use the finger print unlock feature, I cut out the strip of leather at the home-bottom area on the case. As you can see in my photo it is easier to place my finger in that space.
customer_reviews.author: C.Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t put my iPad mini asleep
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case. Definitely protects my iPad mini. However, it didn’t keep my iPad mini asleep and it constantly ran out of power. I took my iPad mini to be checked and they told me to try a different case. I ordered another one from Amazon and this one definitely keeps my iPad mini asleep when cover is closed.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Tricardo

customer_reviews.title: Ipad Mini 2 Cover
customer_reviews.text: This ipad cover fits my ipad mini 2 wonderfully!! Just a little hard to push the power button on the ipad to turn off but not enough to return item. l like the magnetic closure & the outer pocket & elastic holder for a pen or stylus. The foldover opening & ridges are very handy for watching a movie at a comfortable angle. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Radar

customer_reviews.title: I’m so happy I bought this it’s made very well and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I bought this it’s made very well and the quality is awesome! It’s thick and protects my iPad . At first I was skeptical but when I opened it I knew I made the right choice. The color is pretty and I love how it Sits up so I don’t have to hold it in my hand . It has a pocket so I can put my license in there to . All in all I’m happy with it and would definitely buy again from this company!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: iPad Mini Case
customer_reviews.text: The case is definitely sturdy and durable. The iPad Mini fits in snugly - and sometimes I have to push the device over in order to access prompts in the upper left corner because the case gets in the way. The fold out "stand" works best in a horizontal position rather than a vertical position but it's a convenient feature.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R

customer_reviews.title: case hides buttons
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time searching for a cover for my iPad Mini 2. I settled on this one because it is slim, lightweight, looks nice, but most importantly has grooves to hold the screen up for reading. I didn't see anyone mention this, but the frame of the case hides the tablet buttons. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Peterman

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy case
customer_reviews.text: This case covers the ipad well and I like the magnet closure. I don't even worry about what will happen if I drop the tablet. My main issue is that the edges of the ipad are somewhat covered up so it's hard to use the fingerprint lock release, as well as whatever is in the upper left hand corner - the back button, mail, etc. I have to try to push the tablet over inside the case so I can access these things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but doesn’t hold or protect well
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my iPad mini2 well. Does not hold it securely. Cover magnet not strong enough to hold it closed. 🙁 Returned it and Amazon refunded 🙂
customer_reviews.author: TheDon

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: for my wife. i gave her my old tablet and she uses it mainly for games or reading. so the built in stand was important. a pretty color. very secure. she likes the feeling of the material when in hand. a very good deal at time of purchase. hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy another one if they keep this design.
customer_reviews.text: I like the cover art SO much, and the price is good. Lots of compliments from people who remember the comp books. The vinyl is cracking a bit at the spine, and it isn't holding up the tent shape really well, but I'm hard on it; in almost constant use. I'll take some of the blame.
customer_reviews.author: Rosy

customer_reviews.title: Fits tablet nicely
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this case for my ipad mini 2 since my last one cracked around where it clips onto the tablet. This case you slide the tablet into, no worries of the plastic breaking. It holds tablet well and props up nicely. It does not swivel to give you the ability to prop when standing length wise.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Ugly inside
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the very pretty outside, a medium blue floral print, because I was tired of looking at my grubby black cover. However, the inside is dark gray and black and ugly, so i am back where I started. Also it doesn’t fit my iPad mini 3 as well as my old cover.
customer_reviews.author: PennyCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with my Fintie Mini Ipad case. It was easy to assemble. It is sturdier than my previous case. It is reasonably priced. I especially like the sleep feature. When the cover is closed, the Ipad is in sleep mode and conserves battery. My previous case did not have this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Unique case!
customer_reviews.text: This case is very nice! It’s definitely an eye catcher and conversation starter. The price was very reasonable, I’ve also had this same case for my larger iPad and it’s been holding up for about two years now. Overall, I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very padded
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for just over a week but I really like it. It's nice and thick and I feel like it will protect my ipad mini better than my last case. The stand holds it up securely too. I will update if it falls apart or something soon.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stearns

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, don't like the pen area.
customer_reviews.text: The cover is a great, it is an affordable option for the iPad mini with a quality look. The only thing I do not like is that the pen is hanging off the side. I wish that had a better design to protect the pen.
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my Mini for 5 years, and this will make my 4th case. This one is a little heavier that previous ones, but it is so much more substantial. Expect it will last as long as the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not dog proof!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these I bought for my wife. Our rescued beagle ate the first two but it protected the mini iPad. My wife loves this cover! I love my wife and my dog. If my dog eats this one I’ll order another. Great cover but not dog proof!
customer_reviews.author: Big Tink

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, stylish protection for my iPad mini
customer_reviews.text: This cover offers much better protection than the one I had before. I dropped my iPad on its corner while in the previous cover and the glass cracked but did not break. I ordered the purple one and like it a lot. It has a narrow slot where you could put papers in and an elastic loop where you could store a stylus.
customer_reviews.author: J. Keay

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but elegant
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, love the sturdiness of this iPad cover, and love the ease of functionality. The auto sleep feature is a must, and it works perfectly! Couldn't be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy G.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE. LOVE. LOVE.
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased this cover for my new iPad...and was so pleased with how well it was made...I ordered one for my iPad mini!! I just wish they made same cover for my iPhone!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: The design is beautiful! The case itself is sturdy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: The design is beautiful! The case itself is sturdy and good quality. I'm happy with the auto sleep/wake feature. I haven't had the issue others have complained about where a portion of the screen is blocked - not sure if that was a design change or a difference between models.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking at covers for my.. Mini I pad 2.. the print is what caught my eye first.. reading it’s features were more eye catching.. it covers the entire device making it safe during travel.. it’s 3 movable prop is extremely sturdy i use this feature at work & at home.. it hasn’t tipped over on me.. not even once!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: great design & value
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fit for my ipad mini. Unlike its predecessor, it permits ease use of all features and has a niffy design for perpendicular use of the screen. I have found the front flap useful for holding a few pieces of paper. I like the cherry or almond tree pattern, on a blue background, and appreciate the low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ann F.

customer_reviews.title: Greatest iPad mini case
customer_reviews.text: I have the iPad mini case. It is a wonderful case. I like the way I can pick from 3 three different angles. To view the screen. It don't move when you enter or touch anything on the screen. I hope they keep on making it so that when I need a new one I'll be able to get one from the same company.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S. Rue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and easy on the budget
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo much better than I expected. Very well made and easy on the budget. They say you get what you pay for, well that’s not always true. My Devicewear lasted less than 6 months with less than normal use and I paid ‘big’ bucks for it. The Fintie was a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: fieldmouse

customer_reviews.title: Looks, feels and functions like it’s way more expensive
customer_reviews.text: This case gets lots of admiring looks and I just know people don’t have a clue what I paid. Looks expensive and feels expensive. And it isn’t! It’s nice having three different angles for the landscape side of use. Not everyone works at the same angle so that’s a big plus. My only issue with the case is that the thickness of the case often makes it had to press any character in the corners without using a stylus. The stylus holder makes that less of an issue than it could be.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy and bulky!
customer_reviews.text: This is way too heavy and bulky for me. It’s also difficult to touch the screen on the sides without bending the case back. Might be ok for some people, it’s just not for me. Returning it for a slimmer one.
customer_reviews.author: B Rose

customer_reviews.title: not what it appears
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a previous Fintie ipad holder. I thought I was getting the same product but not so. The description and picture shows 3 viewing angles. I thought this would rotate to sit in the holder but it does not. It will only sit in the holder horizontally.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Best iPad case I’ve ever bought! 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many iPad covers over the years, this Fintie cover appears to be a better quality product than any other case I’ve used. It looks great and fits perfectly. Hopefully it will last longer than the others I’ve used, time will tell. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Lilred

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works good as a cover but love the way it keeps the screen up in the standing position for reading or keyboarding.
customer_reviews.author: marje's kindle

customer_reviews.title: Well made, inconspicuous and practical
customer_reviews.text: Finite makes great products. The auto sleep feature works well, the iPad mini is held securely in place. The composition notebook style makes the iPad inconspicuous in my girlfriend’s bag, and the small front pocket makes it convenient to hold a license and other daily use flat objects, so for short trips she doesn’t even need her purse.
customer_reviews.author: ARussell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t close tightly.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly. Looks good. Major problem is when I close it, it keeps running. Doesn’t close tightly so my battery dies. At night I plug it in and put a weight on it so it’s closed tight.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Lovely art pattern
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, hardy Mom loves the pattern and she is really particular Keep in mind it doesn’t rotate in the stand so if u looking for both orientations possible on the stand get another
customer_reviews.author: R. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality case
customer_reviews.text: This is the second iPad mini case I’ve purchased from Fintie over the years. I’m extremely happy with the features, feel, and quality of the case. The only thing I’m a little disappointed with is that I wish there were more “happy” style options to choose from. My old case had Japanese flowers on it and I liked that better.
customer_reviews.author: BJF

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty selecting some options
customer_reviews.text: Over all, my wife really liked the case and would've rated it 5 stars except or one little annoying design flaw. The elastic along the bottom of the screen partially blocks some of the options and has to be moved to select them. Other than that, the case is well made, nice looking, stands up nicely and she liked the magnetic closure.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Dog

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that this cover disguises the iPad mini. Especially when I use it during my commute. A friend of mine thought it was an actual note book.
customer_reviews.author: Regijo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cover for mini iPad.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover for my iPad. It is very sturdy and holds the iPad well. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Stark

customer_reviews.title: Case is great for watching tv shows!
customer_reviews.text: Stand is amazing for watching streaming videos! 3 levels to hold iPad up are sturdy and never fall down. Case is thick, durable, includes pen holder and has an automatic lock when opened/closed. The marble design is also very cute.
customer_reviews.author: emily reuvers

customer_reviews.title: iPad cover
customer_reviews.text: Only reason gave a 4 is because I have to use a stylus as it covers some of the screen so finger touch doesn’t always work. Very durable, and was just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Decent case, minor issues
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a decent case. I don't necessarily like that the case is too much over to the right side. Meaning that the left side of the screen is covered, so I have to try to stretch it over to the left side so I could press things on the left side of the screen. Overall it's not terrible. It meets the purpose of what I need it for which is the propped up angle. I got the purpleish colored one. I wish it did come with a stylus though instead since it has the place for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny S

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my ipad mini. It's cute and I can stand up my ipad at different angles. It's held up well so far but I've only had it a couple months. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: howdy2uTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Pebble Leather
customer_reviews.text: Makes propping up iPad Mini easy. The dark purple color is attractive and the pebble leather is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: TexasKH

customer_reviews.title: Adorable iPad case!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a replacement for our very worn out iPad case. My daughter loves this case and has fooled a few people into thinking that it is really a notebook. It is a very sturdy case and sits up nicely when needed. No obstructions when wanting to take pictures. I highly reccommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Roberts Carle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, as I use composition pads with the same design at work for written notes, so it matches! And, my brother came to visit from California and he had the same case for his notebook - what a coincidence!
customer_reviews.author: B. MacIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: iPad fit as described and the quality seems to be good. Can’t comment on durability yet but appears To be build to long long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce S

customer_reviews.title: Buy this case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! Finally I found a durable case with a reliable stand and maximum protection. The buttons are open so there’s no fighting a false button. The price was very affordable and delivered in one day. I highly recommend, you won’t regret it. I plan to buy one for my daughter with the iPad I’m giving her for Christmas. Shh.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case for the money. My only issues are that it is heavy and quite awkward to hold. It does have a nice three way stand for using your iPad horizontally. However, it is when you want to use it vertically that it becomes awkward. Great delivery though. It came within 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: This is such a pretty design and I love the function
customer_reviews.text: This is such a pretty design and I love the function. My old case would not hold the screen as erect as I would like it. This has three options for the angle of the screen. I like it so much better than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Jujubee

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my mom. She loved it. Would recommend. Good quality and seems protective.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliemarie_3

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like a notebook. Has a pocket where you can put a few small papers inside.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Case
customer_reviews.text: This gets the job done! The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because I think the case drains my battery super fast. It can be on 100% and drop the 50% or low in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Courtina

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’ Have shine like shown.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have shine, but matted look. Cover that holds mini 2 in case looks cheap, but is thick and protective. Easy acces to home button and edges are clear from back spacing etc.
customer_reviews.author: L. pearson

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy
customer_reviews.text: The color is really pretty, matches my moms whole purple motif of her life. Feels sturdy enough that a drop or two won’t hurt a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Well made and stands up in three different positions without slipping, like my old one did.. Nice looking exterior with a place to hold a stylus.
customer_reviews.author: NHQuilter

customer_reviews.title: Really like this case!
customer_reviews.text: Nice case. Very pretty! Just like the picture on add. Only slightly aggravating thing is the bottom of the cover is a little close to the area you need to swipe up for additional icons like your flashlight or wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lunsford

customer_reviews.title: It's all that and more!
customer_reviews.text: Yep, this is a great case! It turns your Mini off when you close it, has different "stand" levels, and is super cute. For the price I cannot believe how well this is made. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kicky-M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and protects my Ipad! Very cute composition book design.
customer_reviews.author: Nickel

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at the quality of this case for $13.99! With a smart stand, magnetic sleep/wake cover, and synthetic leather with stitching, it was an attractive offer, but the pocket on the front for notes, cards, etc., and the beautiful Blossom pattern put it above and beyond. I have a ipad mini 3. I definitely recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: K. O'HARA

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with item!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for my mom for Mother’s Day.. she absolutely LOVES it! She says “it’s so much better than what u wax using before”. She likes the pocket too! Loved the color too. For me.. the price was great! Would highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Lori M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ipod holder!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item! Beautiful cover, great fit, and nice features. My son recommended it, and I am so glad he did. I would, in turn, highly recommend this lovely cover.
customer_reviews.author: jackid

customer_reviews.title: I recently have been using it to watch Netflix/Hulu so this case was perfect to set up while viewing
customer_reviews.text: I have an IPad mini that is mostly use for travel so I just hold in my hand while seated on the plane. I recently have been using it to watch Netflix/Hulu so this case was perfect to set up while viewing :)!Thanks
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Semi easy to hold.
customer_reviews.text: Lacks a strap for holding with one hand. Good protection and fit. I wanted another ionic case that amazon no longer sells. It was 10 times the usefullness of this good case. Availability goes downhill when the best manufacturer is squeezed.
customer_reviews.author: Richards Flora

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this brand for many years,so I believe it’s quality
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: bigly cool case...
customer_reviews.text: great case. my kids ripped on me hard for having a composition book cover case for my ipad. Whatevah.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Ace

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It fits the purpose, what I expected for the price. Nothing bad to disclose
customer_reviews.author: Stu Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design, it feels expensive. I really like that it locks the ipad when you close the flap
customer_reviews.author: empress

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Cute case, works out for my daughter when she plays the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Katie2108

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get my iPad mini into the case but the cover was too small. I could not reach the corner buttons with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Radinsky, DVM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to look at and works very well!
customer_reviews.text: This Fintie iPad cover was first of all very attractive, love the cherry blossom design. iPad just slips into the slot which makes it easy to put in and take out. The leather straps work very well in keeping the iPad in a landscape position, in fact three positions. It is just a little on the heavy side but with everything it does I can overlook that downside. I definitely recommend this lovely product.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Klatt

customer_reviews.title: Great case with a great design
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful and functional case, that both protects the iPad, acts as a support with three inclination degrees and has some minimal storage space and place for a stylus. Would absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: A. K.

customer_reviews.title: Performs as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Product looks and performs as advertised. I would recommend it to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I use my iPad exclusively for reading books. Seems very well made and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover that fits our iPad Mini very well
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover that fits our iPad Mini very well. The 3 positions for holding the iPad upright horizontally were a surprise and work very well. Appears to be well-made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Wahl

customer_reviews.title: Like this iPad mini case
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well-made, sturdy iPad case. Have had it for several years and it has not shown any wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Ann

customer_reviews.title: Terrific iPad Mini Cover
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cover!! Well-built and protects perfectly without affecting the way you use the iPad. Best cover I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Chiperzak

customer_reviews.title: Very durable case
customer_reviews.text: Great case - exactly what I was looking for. Very durable and easy to clean. I enjoy the color as well. Easy to put the iPad in and I don't have to worry about it falling out.
customer_reviews.author: BF2009

customer_reviews.title: Difficult access to home button . Can’t use thumbprint to open
customer_reviews.text: The case itself is really very nice. High quality, good color. The problem I’m having is access to the home button so I can use my thumbprint to open my iPad. I’ve ordered a new case because of this.
customer_reviews.author: wja1956

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This case fit my iPad great. I love the color and the quality of this case. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a great looking case that is durable to keep your iPad safe.
customer_reviews.author: Soto343

customer_reviews.title: I like mine a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like mine a lot. It fits my mini really well, just a tad tight for the on/off and the charge plug in area. Not a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Ann Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this purchase. The quality is great and color sharp. It has a nice pocket in the front to put a credit card etc. overall I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: emh

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover. Has all the features that I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Green

customer_reviews.title: Fits mini IPad.
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it’s light and it protects my iPad. Its durable and has a place for a stylus. It really does stand up when typing.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Good case with corner protection
customer_reviews.text: Great case for the iPad mini. The old case I used had a plastic back and the corners broke off. This case has corners that hold the iPad in place. The only thing I’m not super happy with is that the front covers some of the screen making some things hard to click on. Overall a great case and I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: tsualumni

customer_reviews.title: I am very glad I got this
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad I got this.It is perfect for me.I searched and searched and this is the one I chose.Very satisfied

customer_reviews.title: You Can’t Find A Better IPad Case
customer_reviews.text: Exactly right for my IPad mini 3 and pleased that it is still available. Our second purchase after my wife got an identical one for her IPad mini 4.
customer_reviews.author: Truesmom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT  IPAD MINI COVER
customer_reviews.text: NEEDED a new case, the reviews seemed to get my attention, and I like the styles loop. It looks , feels good. good buy
customer_reviews.author: jacalyn Werkheiser

product_meta.title: Fintie Case for iPad Mini/Mini 2 / Mini 3 [Corner Protection] - [Multi-Angle Viewing] Folio Smart Stand Protective Cover with Pocket, Auto Sleep/Wake for iPad Mini 1 / Mini 2 / Mini 3, Purple
product_meta.description:
Color:PurpleFintie, a quality product within your reach.

This case is designed for iPad Mini 1/ Mini 2 / Mini 3. 
It will not fit for any other iPad. 

Protect your iPad with this Fintie Multi-Angle Viewing Case at all times! The Case sports a simple and classy design made from premium PU leather, and the interior is lined with soft microfiber material that protects your tablet from prints, dirt and scratches.

Built-in Stand:
Three anti-slip stripes, propping up the tablet for considerate sturdy standing view angles and typing feature.

Front Pocket:
A large front Document Pocket to store your business cards, bank cards, notes, bills or other personal belongs while on the go. 

Easy to Use:
Insert your tablet in the open pocket and secure it in place with the fastener flap. Simply open and close to activate wake/sleep modes.

Precise cutouts:
All features of the tablet are accessible even with the case on.

PLEASE NOTE: Colors shown in pictures may slightly differ from actual product due to lighting and color settings.
feature_bullets: Specifically designed for iPad mini 3 (2014 Release, A1599/A1600), iPad mini 2 (2013 Release, A1489/A1490/A1491) & iPad mini 1st Generation (A1432/A1454/A1455).
This case allows you to adjust the iPad to multiple angles securely. Document Card Pocket is designed for you to store your business cards, bank cards, notes or bills while on the go.
Built from durable PU (synthetic) leather exterior and soft microfiber interior - Snug fit, lightweight and protective. Stylus loop design works with stylus pen (stylus NOT included).
Built-in magnetic strip provides sleep/wake feature. Cut outs allow access to Charge Port and Speakers. Headphones Jack and Volume can be accessed while in case.
Protect your iPad from scratches, dirt and grime. Available in a variety of bright and fun colors.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,021 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
